reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering, particularly for curvy figures, and appreciate its classic style that works both dressy and casual.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, color, and great for multiple occasions
items.body: This dress is perfectly true to size, comfortable, and beautiful. The color is flawless, and the cut is very flattering for those of us with an hourglass shape. It’s also very light, so great for warm months, in my opinion. It is absolutely not see-through despite being so light, though! There are no pockets, so expect to have a bag with you or pair with a cardigan/blazer with pockets. It’s great for business casual or you can dress it up a bit more with the right blazer, shoes, and accessories. I highly recommend this dress. Read more
items.author: Gabriele

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dress
items.body: This is a adorable simple , well fitted dress! Can’t beat this price! Read more
items.author: JP

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and comfy but came damaged !
items.body: I’m 5’2” 145-150 lbs. Amazon said a Medium would fit me best but after looking at the reviews I went with a small! It fits perfect in my opinion. I think this dress is super cute! I bought it for a professional event. It goes to my knees and isn’t a low cut or a revealing dress. It isn’t TOO tight either if you size accordingly. It is comfy and stretchy! MY ONLY PROBLEM IS THAT IT CAME RIPPED/stitching is undone where the zipper meets the fabric!!!!! Read more
items.author: Miracle Ellison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great Classic
items.body: This is a very nice classic dress. Material is so nice and is a bit stretchy. I am sometimes between a small and medium so I ordered both sizes and the small fit perfectly. I am 5’7 and about 140-143 lbs. I received so many compliments on this dress while wearing it. Will definitely be ordering in more colors! Love it! Read more
items.author: AmyT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, yet pretty and flattering dress
items.body: I love this dress. The fit was perfect. Nice tummy control, too. The fabric was heavy enough, but not too heavy. I wore it too an outdoor summer wedding, and I was very comfortable. The purple was a true purple, just as I was wanting. Machine washability is also a plus! Read more
items.author: Jimi Hendricks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Fit
items.body: Beautiful quality, lined. I'm 5'3", 160, size 12...the XL fit perfectly in overall fit and length. Well worth the money. Read more
items.author: S. L. Sowle

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small and knit is see-through
items.body: Design is beautiful, but disappointed that the knit was not as thick as I had hoped. It is not lined. Unless worn with a slip, underwear or shape wear was visible. It was too tight overall for me even though my measurements were included at the top range for this size. The color was a darker color than I needed. The photo appeared to be an ivory or off white, but was more like a dark cream. The fabric was soft with a good amount of stretch. Construction was excellent. Stitching was even with no loose threads. The waist seam was even where it connected with the invisible zipper. For reference. I purchased an XXL. I am 5'2" tall and the dress a.e to my knees. I have a 45" busy. 40" waist, and 50" hips. The price was right for the quality. Read more
items.author: Swan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly comfy
items.body: I’m 5’8 215 lbs , wide hips , long torso . I followed the measurements and stuck to an xl . I’m using this as my Rebecca welton costume from Ted lasso and it’s the perfect dress but because I work in corporate America :( I know…. it’s versatile and I can wear this dress to work. Great length it’s actually stretchy and I could have went down to a large but I liked the silhouette that just slightly hugged my curves. If you don’t have a lot of curves personally I’d size down. The arm holes are a little bit but just a bit still very comfy and I’m actually going to be ordering in more sizes . Oh yeah it has a full zipper in the back and material although stretchy is still pretty sturdy. Read more
items.author: faith schmidt

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Ruched Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Bodycon Ruched Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Ruched Sleeveless Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Gray Blue, Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Gray Pink, Purple, Peacock Blue, Blue Green, Royal Blue, Light Pink, Deep Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
